name: Wahoo Fitness TICKR 2 ANT+/Blue Tooth Heart Rate Monitor
categories: TICKR 2 ANT+/Blue Tooth Heart Rate Monitor
description: Combined with the free Wahoo Fitness App, this HRM strap turns your Android or Apple device into a powerful trainer. It’s also both ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatible, so it will play nice with many of your existing training watches.Dual top mounted LEDs: blue indicates connection, red confirms heart rate reading.Connects over ANT+ (unlimited connections at the same time) and Bluetooth™ Smart (up to 3 Bluetooth connections at the same time).Free Wahoo Fitness App tracks heart rate and calories burned in real time.Works seamlessly with 50+ fitness apps, including: Zwift, The Sufferfest, Peloton for cycling and Runkeeper and MapMyRun for running.Replaceable coin cell battery (CR2032) lasts over 500 active hours.In the box: TICKR heart rate monitor, adjustable soft strap, quick start guide.
